hometek.title: Hometek
hometek.projdesc:
Hometek is a leading international supplier to large volume retail chains of high quality products of Kitchen & Home Decor. Hometek constantly invests in better products and services that fit their customers’ strategy in the most efficient way.

They have a wide variety of products. The food preparation products include kitchenware, cutlery and cutting boards, bakeware and cookware, pantryware and spices. Their tableware products consist of flatware, dinnerware, tableware accessories, crystal stemware, giftware and barware. Their home décor products include decorative accessories, non-electric lighting, wall décor, picture frames and seasonal décor. Their lifestyle products include thermal mugs, travel bottles and food storage.

- Taken from the Hometek website

During the creation of this website, material design concepts and ideas were heavily used, capitalizing on today's design trends. Also, a Wordpress theme was customly developped specifically for this client so they can easily manage and add their own content.

league.title: lolstats.gg - LCS Standings & Stats
league.projdesc:
The eSport industry is in full expansion. League of Legends is the most played game in the world with 67 million unique monthly players. Last year, the world championship finals attracted 36 million viewers which is more than the total viewer count for the NBA finals.

Unfortunately, aside from the official LoL eSports website, there is no dedicated website that has in depth statistics. Lolstats.gg is an attempt to fill in the gap in this expanding industry by offering stats about players and teams on par with what major sport leagues offer.
league.tools: Materialize, jQuery, php, Yahoo Query Language

edge.title: Edge Design
edge.projdesc:
Through creativity and innovation, Edge Design continually work on making good tools better, so you can enjoy preparing your meals with a superior edge.

One of the first websites I created, Edge Design encapsules one idea: less is more. This is a fully customly made website in which I had the opportunity to experiment a lot of front-end interactions. This is a one-pager using the jQuery library.

voala.title: Voala Media
voala.projdesc:
Voala is a web app developed for advertising industry. Its main focus is to ease the communication between publishers and advertisers. Acting as an online marketplace, it connects media buyers and sellers by displaying last minutes ads. It also gives access to a database of media kits that are easy to obtain and compare.

This project was part of a startup and I was tasked to create the front and back-end of the web app, while also carefully planning the information architecture.

Here are the main tasks in which I was involved with :

- Web App Development
- Back-end / Database management
- Graphic Design (business cards, presentations, media kit)
- Front-end engineering / usability-UI testing
voala.tools: Materialize, jQuery, Photoshop, Illustrator, Inkscape, php, mySQL
